en.title: New desktop version available
en.description: Upgrade now to access custom desktop notification sounds, Russian spell check, and an improved user experience using multiple workspaces.

en.title: New server version available
en.description: The new [Extended Support Release](https://docs.mattermost.com/administration/extended-support-release.html) v5.31 is now generally available and offers many bug fixes for increased stability, and improved status updates for Incident Management. [Upgrading](https://docs.mattermost.com/administration/upgrade.html) only takes a few minutes.
